faq.a:
Please submit your work report via weekly report Form as well as on the Bounty thread till the end of every week.

1. Fill out the registration application form once.
2. Kindly fill up the forms in Bitcointalk.
3. Fill in your activities in the form.

Report Example
ERC-20 Wallet AddressÂ : ________
Campaign ID: ________
Week Number: __________
Work URLs:
1. _________
2. _________
3. _________
4. _________
5. _________
There is no spreadsheet but we create https://asure.network/bounty site where you can check your shares.
You have to register for KYC / Whitelisting From and from the 1st of December you can buy tokens.

faq.q: Is KYC needed for bounty hunters?
faq.a: No. For Bounty Hunters KYC is not needed at the moment.

faq.q: When will the bounty ASR tokens be distributed?
faq.a: The distribution of the tokens to bounty participants will occur after the end (31. Dec. 2019) of TGE.
No, but you can complete the task for two weeks or more and then report it.

ui.name: Airdrop
ui.title: Registration Airdrop
ui.description:
Just follow the easy steps in Airdrop form.

1) Follow Asure Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/AsureNetwork
2) Retweet the pinned post and put hashtags: #asure #asuretoken $ASR #tge #ico #ieo #crypto #defi #socialsecurity @asurenetwork
3) Follow Asure Main Telegram: https://t.me/AsureNetwork
4) Follow Asure Bounty Telegram: https://t.me/AsureBounty
5) Follow us on other social media channels
https://fb.me/AsureNetwork
https://medium.com/AsureNetwork
https://www.linkedin.com/company/asure
https://www.youtube.com/c/AsureNetwork
https://www.reddit.com/r/asure
https://peepeth.com/AsureNetwork
6) Write a nice comment to Asure Airdrop Announcement in Bitcointalk topic.
rules: Only one account per person. Using multi-accounts, cheating and spamming are strictly forbidden.
Your payment address cannot be changed. Once you apply, your address will be locked. (Every participant is responsible for the protection of his/her payment address and private keys).
You need to join our Bounty Telegram group in order to participate in the Asure Airdrop/Bounty program.
Without joining the telegram group, you will not be counted on any Airdrop/Bounty.
The Telegram link is: https://t.me/AsureNetwork
The Bounty Telegram link is: https://t.me/AsureBounty
The ones breaking the rule will be disqualified from the Bounty program without getting any tokens.
The distribution of the tokens to participants will occur after the end (31. Dec. 2019) of Token sale.
Note: ALL BOUNTY RELATED QUESTIONS MUST BE ASKED ONLY IN OUR BOUNTY GROUP HERE: https://t.me/AsureBounty
